Italian ones contend the leadership in innovation and market presence with German companies. One machine out of every five sold worldwide is made in Italy.* Italian biotech companies totaled 489 in 2015. The turnover is over $11.6 billion, while investments in R&D amounted to $2 billion with about 3,670 employees in research. Biotechnology is among the sectors with the higher innovation in Italy.
